long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Technologo Instant extension takes a selected image's URL, then passes it into the Technologo application and then a new webpage is opened to edit the image. The customer can see the original image and use various tools to add a logo or text to the image. They can also select different imprint options to edit the logo. Then once the customer is happy with the image they can send it via email to their end customer.
